results.title: Flying Tigers cinema slide
results.brief_description: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape. This coloured slide is an advertisement for ‘Flying Tigers’ (a.k.a. ‘Yank Over Singapore’ and ‘Yanks Over the Burma Road’) featuring John Wayne Carroll distributed by Republic Pictures. Four pieces of black tape have been adhered to the top and bottom edges to cover cinema session details.

Four pieces of black tape have been adhered to the top and bottom edges to cover cinema session details.

results.title: Alrfred Hithcock's Lifeboat cinema slide
results.brief_description: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape. This coloured slide is an advertisement for Alfred Hitchcock’s production of ‘Lifeboat’ featuring Tallulah Bankhead distributed by 20th Century Fox Pictures. Four pieces of cream tape have been adhered to the top and bottom edges to cover cinema session details.

results.title: The Girls He Left Behind cinema slide
results.brief_description: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape. This coloured slide is an advertisement for the film ‘The Girls He Left Behind’ featuring Alice Faye and Carmen Miranda distributed by 20th Century Fox Pictures. Four pieces of cream tape have been adhered to the top and bottom edges to cover cinema session details.

results.title: Four Jills in a Jeep cinema slide
results.brief_description: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape. This coloured slide is an advertisement for the film ‘Four Jills in a Jeep’ featuring Kay Francis, Carole Landis, Martha Raye, and Mitzi Mayfair distributed by 20th Century Fox Pictures. Three pieces of cream tape have been adhered to the top edge to cover cinema session details. Kay Francis, Carole Landis, Martha Raye, and Mitzi Mayfair as themselves, re-enacting their USO tour of Europe and North Africa during World War II.
results.description: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape. This coloured slide is an advertisement for the film ‘Four Jills in a Jeep’ featuring Kay Francis, Carole Landis, Martha Raye, and Mitzi Mayfair distributed by 20th Century Fox Pictures. Three pieces of cream tape have been adhered to the top edge to cover cinema session details. Kay Francis, Carole Landis, Martha Raye, and Mitzi Mayfair as themselves, re-enacting their USO tour of Europe and North Africa during World War II.
description_for_label: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape. This coloured slide is an advertisement for the film ‘Four Jills in a Jeep’ featuring Kay Francis, Carole Landis, Martha Raye, and Mitzi Mayfair distributed by 20th Century Fox Pictures. Three pieces of cream tape have been adhered to the top edge to cover cinema session details. Kay Francis, Carole Landis, Martha Raye, and Mitzi Mayfair as themselves, re-enacting their USO tour of Europe and North Africa during World War II.

results.title: Every Other Inch a Lady cinema slide
results.brief_description: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape and internal black frame. This coloured slide is an advertisement for the film ‘Every Other Inch a Lady’ featuring Lana Turner distributed by Metro Goldwyn Mayer Pictures Ltd. Several pieces of cream tape have been adhered to the top edge to cover cinema session details

results.title: The Song of Bernadette cinema slide
results.brief_description: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape. This hand coloured slide is an advertisement for the film ‘The Song of Bernadette’ featuring Jennifer Jones and Charles Bickford produced by Twentieth Century Fox Picture. Three pieces of cream tape have been adhered to the top and bottom edges to cover cinema session details.

results.title: Under the Clock cinema slide
results.brief_description: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape and internal black frame. This hand coloured slide is an advertisement for the film ‘Under the Clock’ featuring Judy Garland by Metro Goldwyn Mayer Ltd. A piece of light brown tape has been adhered to the top edge of the image to cover session times.

results.title: Bell & Howell Model 601 16mm Film Projector with Speaker, Tripod and Accessories
results.last_on_display_place: Australian Centre for the Moving Image
results.material_description:
001: metal
002: metal and wood
003: cast iron mechanics with a vinyl case
004: speaker in wooden carry case with green vinyl finish and red material.
005: plastic
006: wooden base and metal top.  The metal has tarnished to a green colour and there is brown rust.
007: plastic
008: glass and metal bulbs wrapped in bubble-wrap and housed in original cardboard box.
009: plastic with a metal centre.
010: metal on wooden base.
011: metal case
012: metal (cast-iron?) case
013: metal, leather and plastic
014: plastic rubber
015: red vinyl, wood, rubber, leather and metal.
results.brief_description: Movie projector with accessories. Metal tripod and screw in projector base with a flat platform. Bell and Howell Model 601 projector in case which fits the projector stand. There is also a like projector which isn’t in a case, that was likely a backup or replacement projector for that housed in the canvas. There is the companion Bell and Howell speaker, and also a no brand red-coloured miscellaneous speaker. Housed in the Bell and Howell speaker are two empty reels (1 x 400ft and 1 x 1600ft 16mm), cords, 2x globes, a wooden based film reel winder, and a film splicer. A Bell & Howell Amp/Mixer, and a power box which plugs into speaker/projector as a source of power.
results.title_for_label: Bell & Howell Model 601 16mm Film Projector with Speaker, Tripod and Accessories
